title: Beijing 2022: Chloe Kim on her comeback plus Jaelin Kauf on going plastic free
description: Two incredible athletes are featured on the daily podcast from Beijing 2022. Reigning Olympic champion in the women's halfpipe snowboard is Chloe Kim of the USA. She had a rough time after winning at PyeongChang 2018. But she's recovered to be one to watch today. Plus, Jaelin Kauf took a silver medal for Team USA in the women's moguls but she's also keen to convince people to go plastic free as much as they can. Listen now for some gentle encouragement...
